demo.name: ZW_SerialAPI_Controller_7.13.3_EFR32ZG14_REGION_EU
demo.label: Controller SerialAPI EU gecko 7.13.3
demo.description:
Z-Wave Controller SerialAPI EU gecko 7.13.3. 
ATTENTION: If reprogramming the chip with a SerialAPI build
for another frequency than the one currently used on chip,
remember to communicate the new frequency to SerialAPI as well
after reprogramming, otherwise the previous used frequency will
be used. This can for instance be done from the PC Controller
software under Transmit Settings.
